page.title: 10THE LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: Bingham Leisure Centre can offer sports for every age all year round. There are more than 20 sporting activities including tennis, squash, gymnastics, table tennis, swimming, badminton, football, etc. Following are a few comments from chidren about the use of the centre:- "I like going to gym because there are horses to jump on, bars to swing on, steps to climb on and mats to play games on. Some people have their birthday at gym." (6 yr. old) "I like swimming because it refreshes you and you have a good time and you can have a shower and get warm." (6 yr. old) "What I like is playing football and cricket because I am very good at hitting the ball with the bat.I am not so good at football because sometimes I win and sometimes I lose."(6 yr.old)
